data: ds-markdown provides two main components: DsMarkdown and MarkdownCMD.
data.dsmarkdown#DsMarkdown: A basic Markdown typing animation component, suitable for static content.
data.markdowncmd#MarkdownCMD: A Markdown component that supports streaming data, suitable for handling real-time data streams.
data.quick-navigation#Quick Navigation:
Props - All available property configurations
Methods - Component instance methods
Type Definitions - TypeScript type descriptions

data: Component methods exposed through ref, used to control typing animation.
data.start#start(): Start typing animation, manually trigger animation start.
data.stop#stop(): Pause typing animation, can be called during typing.
data.resume#resume(): Resume typing animation, used together with stop().
data.restart#restart(): Restart typing animation, play current content from the beginning.
data.pushcontent-answertype#push(content, ans: Add content and start typing, supports streaming data.
data.clear#clear(): Clear all content and state, reset component.
data.start-1#start(): Start typing animation, manually trigger animation start.

data.common-props-for-dsmarkdown-and-markdown: Prop	Type	Description	Default	interval	number | IntervalConfig	Typing interval configuration, supports fixed interval or dynamic speed control	30	timerType	'setTimeout' | 'requestAnimationFrame'	Timer type, cannot be modified dynamically	'setTimeout'	answerType	AnswerType	Content type (affects style theme), cannot be modified dynamically	'answer'	theme	Theme	Theme type	'light'	plugins	IMarkdownPlugin[]	Plugin configuration	[]	math	IMarkdownMath	Math formula configuration	{ splitSymbol: 'dollar' }	showCursor	boolean	Whether to show cursor during typing animation	false	cursor	React.ReactNode | 'line' | 'block' | 'underline' | 'circle'	Custom cursor element or built-in cursor type	'line' (when showCursor is true)	onEnd	(data?: IEndData) => void	Typing completion callback	-	onStart	(data?: IStartData) => void	Typing start callback	-	onBeforeTypedChar	(data?: IBeforeTypedChar) => Promise<void>	Callback before character typing, supports async operations, will block subsequent typing	-	onTypedChar	(data?: ITypedChar) => void	Callback after each character is typed	-	disableTyping	boolean	Disable typing animation effect	false	autoStartTyping	boolean	Whether to automatically start typing animation, set to false for manual trigger, cannot be modified dynamically	true	codeBlock	IMarkdownCode	Code block configuration	{headerActions: true}
data.dsmarkdown-specific-props#DsMarkdown Spe: Prop	Type	Description	Default	children	string | undefined	Markdown content	-
data.markdowncmd-specific-props#MarkdownCMD S: MarkdownCMD does not require a children prop. Content is added dynamically through the push() method.

data.parameter-description#Parameter Descript:
interval={20} - Set typing interval to 20ms
answerType="answer" - Use answer style theme
Content supports full Markdown syntax

data.usage-in-code-blocks#Usage in Code Block: The cursor will automatically adapt to code blocks, displaying at the end of the code content:
data.property-description#Property Descriptio: Property	Type	Description	Default	showCursor	boolean	Whether to show cursor	false	cursor	'line' | 'block' | 'underline' | 'circle' | React.ReactNode	Cursor style or custom element	'line'

Built-in KaTeX rendering engine

Responsive charts, automatically adapt to container size

data:
üöÄ React Markdown typing animation component with modern chat interface effects
A React component designed for modern AI applications, providing smooth real-time typing animations and full Markdown rendering capabilities.
data.core-problems-solved#Core Problems Solve:
Streaming Data Typing Stuttering
Traditional typewriter components struggle with AI backend streaming data. Since each chunk contains multiple characters, stuttering and character skipping occur. ds-markdown intelligently splits each chunk, ensuring smooth typing for every character.
Disconnected Markdown Rendering and Typing Animation
Most typewriter components only support plain text and cannot render Markdown syntax, math formulas, charts, and other rich media content in real-time during typing.
data.value-delivered#Value Delivered:
Enhanced User Immersion
Provides professional-grade AI chat experience, making users feel the real AI interaction process, greatly improving product professionalism and user satisfaction.
Out-of-the-Box, Reduced Development Complexity
Complete solution that supports streaming data, Markdown rendering, math formulas, charts, and other complex features without additional configuration.
data.core-features#Core Features:
ü§ñ AI Chat Ready - Professional AI streaming response typing animation
üìù Full Markdown Support - Code highlighting, tables, lists, etc.
üî¢ Math Formulas - KaTeX support, $...$ and $$...$$ syntax
üìä Mermaid Charts - Flowcharts, sequence diagrams, Gantt charts, etc.
üé® Customizable - Light/dark themes, configurable typing speed
‚ö° High Performance - Lightweight, smooth animations
üîå Extensible - Plugin system, supports custom functionality
üì¶ TypeScript - Full type support
‚ú® Typing Cursor - Multiple cursor styles, enhanced visual effects
data.next-steps#Next Steps:
Read Get Started to learn basic usage
Check API Documentation to understand all configuration options
Browse Examples to see real-world use cases
data.related-projects#Related Projects:
react-markdown-typer - If you need a lightweight markdown typing component
ds-markdown-mermaid-plugin - Mermaid chart support plugin

data: Help you smoothly transition from v0 to v1
data.-migration-overview#üìã Migration Overv: ds-markdown v1 brings many new features and improvements while maintaining most compatibility with v0. This guide will help you quickly understand the major changes and complete the upgrade.
data.1-default-timer-type-change#1. Default T:
The default value of timerType will change from setTimeout to requestAnimationFrame to provide a smoother animation experience.v0:
v1:
Recommended Action: If you want to keep v0 behavior, please explicitly set timerType="setTimeout".
data.2-dynamic-push-usage-change#2. Dynamic p:
Dynamic push usage changed from push(newChunk, 'answer') to push(newChunk).v0:
v1:
data.1-support-auto-import-css#1. Support Aut:
Support auto import CSS, no need to manually import CSS.v0:
v1:
